column2: RISE Education Cayman Ltd. engages in the provision of after-school English teaching and tutoring services. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 3,512 full-time employees. The Company, through its subsidiaries, offers after-school English teaching and tutoring services to students aged three to 18. The company operates in Chinaâ€™s junior English Language Training (ELT) market. Its offers three flagship courses, including Rise Start, Rise On and Rise Up, that are designed for students aged three to six, seven to twelve and 13 to 18, respectively. As of June 30, 2017, the Company had a network of 246 learning centers across 80 cities in China, among which 56 were self-owned centers and 190 centers were franchised learning centers. Its suite of products comprises both online and offline coursework. Its also offers a series of complementary products to students from both self-owned learning centers and franchised learning centers, including online products Can-Talk and Rise Library Online, and offline products Rise Camp, Rise Workshop and Rise Overseas Study Tour.
